name: Farm Defence (XCreator Minigames)
description:
Farm Defence (in development) Plot

You are a farmer and you love your lambs! But you farm is being ivaded by... UFOS! They want to abduct your lovelly lambs, and they want to make crop circles in your crops! But they come to the wrong farm, they will  know your super cannon (stolen from area 51). Can you stop the UFO invasion ?

How to Play

Z or X to shot.

Z or X + Left or Right Arrow to Shot Left and Right Cannons

If you could support my work by making a donation  I would greatly appreciate it. I know that money can be tight, so please know that even $5 helps me a lot ! Let me know if you have any questions and I’ll be happy to answer them. Thank you!
